# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its exceptional quality and features, I'm confident it will meet your needs perfectly. I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $150. This is a special offer tailored for you, considering the value this product can bring to your life. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer 
(3) Buy the product from Jhon for $120

You chose to make a counteroffer to Alice.

Send your counteroffer to Alice.

Alice rejected your offer from round 2.

Alice's offer:

I hope this revised offer aligns better with your financial considerations and allows us to move forward with the transaction.

(2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer
